Name: No More Pop Music - Annihilation
About the game: The pop stars are destroying the Music World! A platform game inside a musical score. You will be guided by the music to know when and where the next note will appear. Jump fast before you fall into the emptiness of ostracism. No More Pop Music is a musical platform game, where the platforms are, literally, musical notes. Jump to next note before the current note disappears. Combine your musical intuition with your platformer skills. Rescue Princess Harmony's cousins, save the Kingdom of Music from the pop star invaders. Find out who is behind them all.
